mapper.select: select ps.product_service_id, ps.product_info_id, ps.is_confirm, ps.is_present, ps.confirm_prompt, ps.succ_prompt, ps.canncel_prompt, ps.popularize_start_time, ps.popularize_end_time, ps.is_free, ps.free_time, ps.billing_id, ps.discount_remark, ps.discount_id, ps.need_confirm, ps.send_num, ps.order_command_match, ps.order_access, ps.order_access_match, ps.cancel_command_match, ps.cancel_access, ps.cancel_access_match, ps.on_demand_command_match, ps.on_demand_access, ps.on_demand_access_match, ps.eff_time, ps.exp_time, ps.is_alone_order, ps.notify_type, ps.product_city, ps.product_service_period_grade, ps.product_service_grade, ps.product_credit, ps.status, ps.report_message_url, ps.sp_product_id, pi.company_code, pi.company_name, pi.product_name, pi.product_order_id, pi.cp_access_id,pi.order_command, pi.on_demand_command, pi.product_name from product_service ps , product_info pi where ps.product_info_id = pi.product_info_id and pi.cp_access_id = #{cpAccessId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
